definition: to appraise at the current rate
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: The common driers are metal octoate and metal naphthenate.
sentences.chinese: 常用的是变价金属环烷酸盐和异辛酸盐。

sentences.english: The business volume of post and telecommunications is calculated at 2000 constant prices.
sentences.chinese: 邮电业务总量按2000年不变价格计算。

sentences.english: Moreover, the influences of the valence change tendency of rare earth elements for the afterglow performance were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 总结了激活离子变价倾向对余辉性能的影响。

sentences.english: The electronic conductance of the glass is mainly proceeded through the valence change of vanadium ions.
sentences.chinese: 玻璃的电子电导主要是由钒离子的变价来进行的。

definition: to sequester/to seize (assets)/to seal up/to close down
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
to detain/to hold in custody/to distrain/to seize property
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
restitution/return of something to its original owner/remittance
